name: Wedding Wonderland
subtitle: Crafting Fairy Tale Moments
description: Create the fairy tale wedding you've always dreamed of. From venue selection to the last dance, we've got you covered.

name: Birthday Bash Bonanza
subtitle: Turning Birthdays into Spectacular Celebrations
description: Celebrate another trip around the sun in style! Customized themes, entertainment, and more.

name: Anniversary Affair
subtitle: Rekindling Love, Celebrating Milestones
description: Rekindle the romance and celebrate the years together. We'll make your anniversary unforgettable.

name: Engagement Extravaganza
subtitle: Designing the Perfect Prelude to Forever
description: Kick off your journey to forever with a celebration that reflects your love story. We handle the details; you enjoy the moment.

name: Retirement Rendezvous
subtitle: Cheers to New Beginnings and Happy Retirements
description: Cheers to new beginnings! Let's create a retirement party that captures a lifetime of achievements and sets the stage for the next adventure.

name: Baby Bliss Bash
subtitle: Welcoming the Sweetest Addition to Your Family
description: Welcome the newest addition to your family with a joyous and beautifully crafted baby shower. It's a day filled with love and laughter.
